## Are you in the Dark?
Current Time: **`r current`** 

```{r, echo = FALSE}
suppressWarnings(library(leaflet))

City_Cords <- data.frame(lat=c(34.05349,47.60357, 42.93708,51.50642,39.90657,-33.8696,35.685),
                             lng=c(-118.2453,-122.3295,-75.6107,-0.12721,116.3876,151.207,139.7513889 ))
City_Names<-c("Los Angeles","Seattle","New York","London","Bejing","Sydney","Tokyo")

DN_map<-leaflet(data=City_Cords) %>% 
        addTiles() %>%
        addTerminator(
            resolution=10,
            group = "Day/Night ON/Off") %>%
        addLayersControl(overlayGroups = "Day/Night ON/Off",
            options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE))%>%
        setView(-0.12721,51.50642, zoom = 2) %>%
        addMarkers(popup=City_Names)
        
DN_map            
                                
```
